item.description:
Hi everyone, we are creating a new team for the FSSG (Fun Sport & Social Group) coed recreational slow-pitch softball league. Not a meetup but a scheduled league. Everyone must be at least 21 years old with a fun attitude.

 

This league plays Tuesdays in JP and Thurs in Hyde Park. One game per week, all teams will rotate fields and Tues or Thurs nights. Starts May 1 and run through July 31.  Creating one new team, need 5 more guys and 2 more women. Games at 8 and 9:15pm.

$65 per person and you all chip in a couple bucks for the ump each game.

If you want to play please contact me by email, not by meetup, at fssg@hotmail.com.

Fun league, nice people, I hope you can join us!

 

Kathy Mahoney

fssg@hotmail.com
item.name: Coed Slow pitch softball league forming new teams now - men & women spots
